original_text: You will remember all the wrong things that you did which made you unclean. You will be ashamed of yourselves because of all the evil things that you have done.
korean_text: 거기에서 너희의 길과 스스로 더럽힌 모든 행위를 기억하고 이미 행한 모든 악으로 말미암아 스스로 미워하리라

sentences.original_text: You will remember all the wrong things
sentences.korean_translation: 너희는 모든 잘못된 것들을 기억할 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will be ashamed of yourselves
because of all the evil things
